title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies: Integrated Information Literacy Project for Practitioner Skill Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics theory, understanding of research methodologies, and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can systematically search for academic/practical materials suitable for real-world math problems from credible information sources.
Learners can critically evaluate collected information to select evidence-based resources applicable to problem-solving.
Learners can accurately cite sources according to standard citation norms (e.g., APA style) when producing project deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
